title: Need a private network to play league on, i have tried a few (private tunnel) and they dont work
body: I am 17 and at a boarding school for 10 months out of a year. and i want to play league on my school wifi but it is blocked, i am not a naughty boy. i have done my studies and i am passing everything, this is for the 6 hours a day when i am not in class or sleeping and have done all my homework and would much appreciate any help i could receive

replies.body: I used Private tunnel at my local library and it worked fine... the ping was like 500-1000 so I never played again but ... it worked for me .. not sure why its not working for you .. maybe the school has different security .. but one of my friends used to use "Ulta surf" I think it was called .. not if if it worked with LoL but it worked with everything else .. so maybe worth a shot?

Lol apparently no one realises hes looking for a vpn.

Now i cant help you out with that as ive never had to use one for lol but atleast people know what your talking about now.
Not sure troll or just not thinking
Never mind, I don't think my link is allowed and it's nowhere what you're after. My mistake.
"i am not a naughty boy" ...... BAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA

Sorry mate, but you will never be able to receive the game files to give you access to the game offline. Because of the security issues of hackers using those files to upload into riots servers etc to cheat in the game.
